templates.name: Differences between the Quinton Hypertonic and Isotonic
templates.content: Quinton ISOTONIC (QuintEssential 0.9) - "The Tonic" is raw seawater with added Alpine spring water to match the concentration of your bodily fluids. It has marine plasma almost identical to human plasma, it works fastest to restore homeostasis, energetic transference quickly shifts the bioterrain. It promotes nervous system balance and healthy stress response and supports healthy sleep cycles and calms before bed. You can take 1 in the morning 30 minutes before meals, you can add 2 more throughout the day as needed, always in divided doses (by at least 1 hr). You can also use it before bed if you have trouble falling asleep. Quinton HYPERTONIC (QuintEssential 3.3) "The Nutrient" is raw, unadulterated seawater higher in mineral concentration than human plasma, and it shares same precise minerals ratios as Isotonic. It immediately revitalizes and energizes during both physical or emotional depletion. It has 4x the magnesium concentration as what's in the blood. You can add it to purified water to add minerals back in, and it cn be used in nebulizer. To reiterate, isotonic is considered as the "medicine" and hypertonic as the "nutrient". So if you're working on improving complex health challenges, the Isotonic has superior identity with and accessibility to the extracellular terrain - proven over the past 125 years. There's no problem using hypertonic as a food or beverage additive to increase the amount of minerals & trace elements to compensate for what is missing.

templates.name: What shelf life does the caviar have? / How long will it stay fresh?
templates.content: Being a raw product packed without any preservatives besides salt, our caviar has a very limited shelf life. We recommend storing unopened tins of caviar in the coldest part of your fridge along with refrozen ice packs and consuming it within 1 week of delivery. Stored properly, unopened caviar will last up to 3 weeks. For your reference, please also check the best by date on the back side of each tin in your order. Once the tin is opened, we highly recommend consuming it within 48 hours for the best flavor and texture.

templates.name: Care instructions

templates.name: I canâ€™t get my press-on nails to come off, what do I do?
templates.content:
If you're having trouble taking off the nails, please continue to soak them in warm water, with oil, and soap. It's very important that you don't force the nails off since that can cause severe damage to your natural nails. One recommendation is to use floss to remove the nails in a gentle way. To see the process, please check out this video: https://www.tiktok.com/@glamnetic/video/7031638946748615982?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&item_id=7031638946748615982&lang=en 
Please also keep in mind that the recommended application process is meant to keep the nails on for two weeks. So if you're looking to only wear the nails for a few days we recommend using our Press-N-Go Removable Nail Tabs which are meant to be used for shorter timeframes.

templates.name: Allergic Reactions
templates.content: We recommend conducting an "Area/Patch Test" first. This test allows you to test a small area of your skin for 24 hours before applying the treatment to a larger area. We recommend rubbing the CurlMix mixture on the skin near your elbow, covering it with a bandage for 24 hours and if there is no allergic response (redness, itchiness, swelling) then apply the treatment as directed in the instructions. If you have an allergic reaction, we do not recommend the use of CurlMix and suggest that you seek a medical professional's consultation.

templates.name: How long does the finish last
templates.content: Our products are designed to last a lifetime! They are built with a tri-ply construction where a layer of aluminum (heating element) is sandwiched between two layers of high-grade stainless steel for optimal heat distribution. The aluminum never comes in contact with your food. Our pans are coated with an FDA-approved non-stick coating. Moreover, our patented laser-etched stainless steel hexagon design is raised above the non-stick surface, allowing you to use metal utensils, making it more resistant to scratching or chipping. Coatings that don't contain PTFE have a shorter life span. After some time, they eventually lose their non-stick capabilities and wind up in a landfill. For this reason, HexClad uses a PTFE coating that has been approved by the US FDA for use on cookware to ensure a long-term non-stick solution.

templates.name: What is stress incontinence?
templates.content: Stress incontinence refers to physical stress on the bladder or abdomen that forces urine to escape the body. It frequently results from weak pelvic floor muscles, but can also be the result of a deficient urethral sphincter due to pregnancy, childbirth, surgery, an enlarged prostate, or a hormonal shift.

templates.name: Is my hair growing back faster?
templates.content: A lot of people feel that their hair grows back faster when using a weighted razor vs. plastic. And the difference they're noticing is happy skin growing out healthy hair. When shaving with a single blade razor you're cutting the hair below the surface of the skin vs. at the surface, creating a shorter distance for hair to grow and this may appear as hair growing faster. You are getting two-in-one benefits: the closest shave and exfoliation.

templates.name: Sempervivum - planting / spread
templates.content: Sempervivum reproduces by offsetting around the base of the rosette, often forming a dense cushion about 4-5 inches in size. Some Sempervivum produce offsets on the end of long stolons which root down at a distance from the parent plant, rather than producing a dense clump. We usually plant mature hens about 5 inches from each other so they will have enough room to produce chicks, but they can be planted only a couple inches apart if desired. After a couple of years, Sempervivum usually create a dense matting that can reach about 2-3 ft. across size. The matting size can be increased by separating chicks and planting another 5 inches away from the original stock.

templates.name: Is a sheet recommended? Difference between using the waterproof mattress vs the regular one with a waterproof cover/pad?
templates.content: The cover for the Original mattress isn't waterproof but it is water resistant. Most messes won't go through to the core, allowing you to easily switch the cover during a late night change and get your little one back to sleep. It has the same breathe-thru materials on both sides making it easy to flip or switch as needed. When you're ready to add waterproof protection during toddler and potty training stages, the mattress pad easily fits on it like a fitted sheet giving breathable, waterproof protection. The pad is also a great item to have when traveling or for a childcare setting, as it can give a layer of breathability to traditional crib mattresses. Our Waterproof mattress has an underlining of waterproofing on one side of the cover for toddler years and the same breathe-thru material of the Original on the infant side. templates.name: Are Nutrafol Hair Growth Nutraceuticals third-party certified?
templates.content:
NSF is a third-party certification that signifies a product meets quality and safety standards set by the FDA to help consumers make safer decisions when choosing supplements. Deeply rooted in science, NSF is widely recognized as the "gold standard" for quality in areas including dietary supplements, with a rigorous testing protocol for additional quality assurance, including testing for contaminants, heavy metals, and pesticides.

Nutrafol Hair Growth Nutraceuticals are NSF Contents Certified. We have begun rolling out NSF Certified for Sport certification for these products, a more rigorous certification designed to give athletes, trainers, and consumers confidence that the product is free from banned substances.

To find out if your product lot number is NSF Certified for Sport, visit NSF's website (https://www.nsf.org).

templates.name: What's the difference between a standardized and a full spectrum herb?
templates.content:
A standardized herb contains a guaranteed percentage of the active component(s) of the herb, which guarantees that every pill in every batch has the same amount of the active ingredient. The percentage of the active ingredient is listed on the label information.

A non-standardized herb may also be referred to as "full-spectrum" or "whole-herb," meaning it's the whole, unadulterated herb, dried and put in pill form. A non-standardized herb is guaranteed to meet the label claim and have the listed amount of the herb; however, it's not guaranteed to have any particular percentage of the active component(s).

templates.name: Will a CO2 laser cut through metal?
templates.content: COâ‚‚ laser engravers should not be used for marking, engraving, or cutting metal. They are best suited for working coatings applied to a metal base, and care must be taken not to attempt work on the underlying metal itself. A variety of coatings specialized for COâ‚‚ engraving are available, and the user should follow the instructions provided as the parameters vary from product to product and metal to metal. Generally, work on aluminum coatings should be done more quickly at lower power and work on steel coatings can be done more slowly at higher power.

templates.name: What is Prop 65?
templates.content: This ominous warning label is required by California for all products and produce made within the state. California has the strictest heavy metal testing in the world. Even some of the produce (kale, spinach, etc.) at local grocery stores must bear the Prop 65 warning. In essence, the label lets consumers know a product comes from the soil and that soil may contain traces of chemicals or heavy metals. But as you know, Organifi blends undergo strict and rigorous third-party testing to ensure these chemicals and heavy metals never make it into the ingredients or finished blends.

templates.name: What is the Sari Wrap skirt fabric?
templates.content:
Our Sari Wrap Skirts are a unique blend of enchanting fall colors that are handpicked and handcrafted with love from reclaimed sari materials. These skirts are not only stylish but also sustainable, making them a great choice for eco-conscious fashion lovers. 

What makes these skirts truly special is their versatility - they are entirely reversible, providing you with multiple looks in one. These skirts are made from 100% reclaimed traditional sari material sourced in India and are composed of a silk blend. Plus, they are made from upcycled fabric, making them even more environmentally friendly.

templates.name: What is the difference between a Subscription and Gift Bokksu?
templates.content:
Our Subscription and Gift boxes contain the same snacks and are shipped in the same manner. They differ by how they are billed. Our subscription boxes are billed on an automatically recurring schedule - meaning, they renew when they expire. By purchasing a subscription product, you agree to be billed per the terms of your subscription plan.

Gift boxes are a one-time payment. You can purchase 3-month, 6-month, or 12-month gifts, and the charge will not renew unless you decide to reactivate your gift order. When you purchase a multi-month gift, you are prepaying for the number of months you wish to gift, without committing to a renewing subscription plan.

templates.content: Our roses have been put through a preservation process and therefore, they will no longer contain their natural scent, however, we still add scent for the flowers which was always appreciated. The scent should last anywhere from 3 weeks to 5 weeks. Once the scent is gone, you're more than welcome to add a spritz of your own personal perfume. Depending on the size of your arrangement, about 1-2 sprays will do just fine. We would advise spraying from a slight distance, so that you do not saturate any of the roses. Just to put things in perspective; our roses are dehydrated then re-hydrated through a chemical process which makes them lose their natural scent. Fresh rose smell is based on flower pollination which is impossible if the flower is preserved, basically this is why it lasts so long. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

templates.name: What is the shelf life of Clairvee?
templates.content: Clairvee's shelf life is 15 months from its manufacturing date (MFG). The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulations allow dietary supplement labels to list an expiration date or date of manufacturing. Products that have a date of manufacturing allow consumers to see the actual date a product was made. If you are concerned about not knowing the actual expiration date, please rest assured that any bottle shipped to you will be efficacious for no less than three months from the date of receipt. As a quick reminder, Clairvee should be taken for 15 consecutive days each month; the remaining days are 'off' until next month, as the probiotic protection continues even on the days you are not taking a capsule.

templates.name: Why do some of my photos look like static, fuzz, or â€œsnowâ€ on a TV?
templates.content: Please note that a bad or missing SD card can cause photos like this one: https://prnt.sc/aKDCsOJ2M2HM Make sure there's an SD card in the camera. The card must be 32 GB or less capacity. It is recommended that you use a Class 10 SD card, preferably 80 MB/s speed or faster. If no speed is shown, it may not be fast enough. Also the card must be standard-sized, not a microSD in an adapater. Make sure that the card is not locked and format the card before you use it. Transmitted photos are like this because they haven't been written to the SD card properly or perhaps not written at all.

templates.name: Will the chargers work if my phone has a case?
templates.content:
Our chargers should be able to connect through most cases that are less than 3mm in thickness.
However, some materials, like metals and magnets, can also cause some connection issues. We recommend using our chargers with a case that does not include magnets or metals. Additionally, our devices are unable to charge a phone with a case that has a pop-socket, ring holder or cardholder, as it makes for a distance of more than 3mm from the charging coils. This also
creates an uneven charging surface.

templates.name: How are Simulated Diamonds made?
templates.content:
All diamond simulants are manufactured with a process called the "skull melt" in
which the materials heat up from the inside outwards. The outside remains relatively cool while the inside melts, forming its own outer crust or "skull". Only
with extreme heat is the "preferred cube form" obtained and a metal oxide stabilizer is added to the process to ensure isometric proportions. When the heat is switched off, the product then cools under rigidly controlled conditions and hardens. As it hardens, the gemstones are formed. Because they're made in a controlled environment, they are also perfect in structure, without feathers or inclusions and since they're solid and not composed of layers, they're almost as hard as a natural diamond. Due to their hardness and clarity they can be cut and faceted using the same proportions used in fine diamonds.

templates.name: Soniclear Petite - How often should you use it?
templates.content: How often you use the Soniclear depends on your specific skin's needs. Most people cleanse 1-2 times daily with Soniclear, but some skin types require to use 1-2 times weekly. The best way to evaluate your skin's needs is to start slow. If using one time per week works for you, that is completely fine. As your skin acclimates to sonic cleansing, you may want to increase usage, but again, that's totally up to you. The best advice is to start slow, let your skin get used to it, and gradually increase usage if you feel you want.

templates.name: What if I feel both dryness and discomfort from feeling sensitive?
templates.content:
When experiencing a range of symptoms at once, including dryness, sensitivity, itching, burning, and stinging, or you are experiencing dryness that is severe enough that you feel hyper-sensitive to touch, our board certified medical advisors suggest addressing discomfort and sensitivity, then dryness. This is to help vulvar and vaginal tissue feel less sensitive with a gentle formulation, until the tissue is able to tolerate a thicker moisturizer.

In this case, we recommend starting with the V Relief Serum. Try the serum risk-free, committing to daily use for 30 days. In consumer studies, women experiencing intimate skin sensitivity, discomfort, and dryness, reported a marked improvement after 28 days of daily use. Once the vulvar and vaginal tissue feels hydrated, discomfort has subsided, and sensitivity is no longer an issue, you can either continue using the serum, or switch to the Daily Vaginal Lotion for a thicker formulation to maintain nourishing moisturization.

templates.name: Are carrier bearing caps side specific?
templates.content: Yes! The carrier bearing caps are bored at the factory and are side specific. Mixing up the carrier bearing caps can be a major mistake in rebuilding a differential, especially if it's a design that uses side adjusters. A good practice is to take a punch and mark one of the carrier bearing caps along with the side of the housing it belongs to in order to prevent mistakes during reassembly.

templates.name: What level of heat should I cook on? (Cookware)

Cooking on medium heat with Hexclad will achieve similar results to cooking at medium-high/high heat with traditional non-stick pans.

templates.name: Can my perfume expire?
templates.content: Expiration in perfume is a technicality. Eau de parfum by nature is oil sitting in pure alcohol which acts as a preservative. In fact, many fumes continue to age as time goes on - as long as they aren't subject to drastic temperature, humidity, and sunlight changes. Some things you may notice after 2 years - chemical interactions with perfume alcohol can cause some materials like citrus to have a bit of an acetone smell. This only lasts for about 30 seconds when first sprayed and is a natural occurrence.

templates.name: Do you use MethylIsothiazolinone / Methylchloroisothiazolinone (MIT / CMIT)?
templates.content: The use of MIT and CMIT in our products is strictly prohibited. Since their invention in the 1960s, MIT and CMIT have been widely used as preservatives in toothpastes, shampoos, body washes, and sterilizing items. In Korea, they were designated as toxic substances in 2012 by Chemicals Control Act, and still available to use only 0.0015 % in wash-off cosmetics and some quasi-drugs.

templates.name: Why add adaptogens to coffee and tea?
templates.content: The properties of caffeine and adaptogens are totally synergistic. Caffeine gives us an immediate boost, whereas adaptogens build long-term, sustainable energy. Caffeine can make us anxious or jittery, whereas adaptogens like ashwagandha have an anti-anxiety effect. Caffeine creates a cortisol release (that 'I can take on the world' feeling) but also taxes our adrenal system over time, whereas adaptogens nourish our adrenals to bring us back into balance. Caffeine stimulates our central nervous system, whereas adaptogens are nervines- meaning they soothe and support our central nervous system. What does this all mean? A calmer, more grounded energy that doesn't deplete our bodies in the same way regular caffeine does.

templates.name: How do I care for my Leather Jacket?
templates.content: We recommend that you clean your leather jacket with a damp cloth, or locate a dry cleaner that specializes in leather. Dry cleaners use a variety of chemicals in their processes, and some may be harmful or damaging to leather items. We suggest finding a dry cleaner that specifically lists leather cleaning as one of their services. We don't recommend the use of a leather conditioner. Instead, we recommend using a leather oil, which can be found at any leather shop. When cleaning your leather jacket, always test on a small, inconspicuous place on the jacket first before moving on to the rest of the jacket.

templates.name: How do I mark the lawn with the scent of another dog?
templates.content: Simply wipe the actual scent of another dog on the potty training grass mat. Bring a slightly damp paper towel to a popular fire hydrant in your neighborhood, the dog park, or anywhere that you notice other dogs peeing. Dab the paper towel on the surface and place it in a plastic baggy to bring home where you will wipe/wring the scent onto the DoggieLawn. The urine of other mammals will also work.

templates.name: The color is wrong / looks nothing like the pictures

The true color won't show through until the activator is applied (usually the powder in the jar won't look as it does on the nail), so we find creating a swatch with 2 dips and viewing in natural light is a great way to see the true color! We also recommend an off-white natural swatch stick instead of a clear one as this provides a better representation of the true color of the product. Once you've created a swatch, and are still not happy with the color, please reach out to sales@revelnail.com with a picture of the swatch and your order number.

templates.name: When does my Clairvee expire?
templates.content:
The date provided in Clairvee bottles is the MFG (Manufacturing) date and not the EXP (Expiration) Date.

U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulations allow dietary supplement labels to list an expiration date or date of manufacturing. Products that have a date of manufacturing allow consumers to see the actual date a product was made. If you are concerned about not knowing the actual expiration date, please rest assured that any bottle shipped to you will be efficacious for no less than three months from the date of receipt. As a quick reminder, Clairvee should be taken for 15 consecutive days each month; the remaining days are 'off' until next month, as the probiotic protection continues even on the days you are not taking a capsule.

templates.name: What is G-10 handle material?
templates.content:
Developed by Westinghouse, G-10 has proved its toughness and durability in both electrical and mechanical device applications. It's constructed from woven glass and epoxy resin, formed under high heat and pressure. The resulting material is incredibly strong, resistant to temperature, impervious to moisture and has a beautiful deep shine when polished.

Your G-10 handle requires exceptionally low maintenance. It will not rust or oxidize, nor will it become brittle or soften over time. A light rub with mineral oil will bring out the natural brilliance and sheen. Among its other uses, G-10 is an ideal material for knife handles, as it is light, doesn't expand or contract due to normal temperature and moisture exposure, and is extremely rugged.

templates.name: The top of my candle is burning weirdly into a tunnel/circle
templates.content: "Tunneling" happens most often when the first candle burn is not given enough time for the melted wax pool to reach the edges of the candle. If you've already established a small melted wax pool that looks like a tunnel, you can melt the top layer of the candle with your lighter or a hair dryer or a heat gun in order to even it out. The next time you light it, let it burn for at least 1 hour, ideally 3 hours.

templates.name: Difference in Timeless Needles
templates.content:
I would be happy to help and explain the difference between our Timeless needles. The standard needle is what comes with your Coravin and is good for most uses. The Fast Pour needle is a gauge wider than the standard and allows for more gas and wine to flow through, however as it's a larger puncture hole this needle is not good for old or dried out corks. The Vintage needle is a gauge thinner than the Standard needle and is designed for the older or damaged corks as its puncture is significantly smaller.
 
Then finally the Premium needle instead of having a single eye hole at the end for the wine to come through, there is a series of smaller grate-like holes that filter out any cork particulate that might break off in the pouring of your wine. Hope this helps!

templates.name: What happens if you find a fault?
templates.content:
Put simply, we'll get it sorted. Quality is super important to us, so issues are rare. But if something is not right, we'll arrange for the collection of your mattress and send out a replacement (or repair the existing one). You're protected like this for 10 years.

This warranty is for faults or product deficiencies, not for normal wear and tear. Every mattress you buy will show some signs of wear after 10 years (in that time you'll sleep on it for nearly 30,000 hours, if you get a good 8 hours a night). So we might ask you to take a picture or make a measurement to kick start your claim. Sound fair? We hope so.

templates.name: Whatâ€™s the difference between an agape simulated diamond and a common CZ / cubic zirconia
templates.content: The main difference is that an inexpensive or common CZ is a much softer and porous stone, thus making it very susceptible to chipping and scratching. CZ's absorb dirt and oils and become milky and cloudy in a short period of time and eventually it'll appear yellowish and will lose its fire and ability to disperse light. Our Diamond Simulants are carefully crafted to be nearly flawless and colorless in every way. They resemble almost the same optical characteristics of a natural diamond, can be shaped into all the same styles and have a Clarity Rating equal to VVS1.

templates.name: How do returns and refunds work for discounted orders?
templates.content:
If you paid full price for your items, if you received a discount on only a specific item, or if you got a discount as part of a sitewide sale, you will receive a refund for the price that you paid for the item, minus any applicable return shipping fees. 

If you purchased a Clove Bundle, used a buy one get one free code offer, or used a Shop Now bonus credit during an exchange and want to return a portion of the items, the overall discount that you received will be proportionally distributed and adjusted for in your refund across all items in the order. templates.name: What's the difference between Enhanced and Connected
templates.content: Great question! The Cefaly Enhanced and Cefaly Connected are both for migraine and tension headache treatment, but the main difference is that the Enhanced works on its own with adjustable settings, no app needed. It's pretty simple and straightforward. The Cefaly Connected, on the other hand, pairs with an app on your phone, letting you track your treatments, progress, and customize settings more easily. The app can even adjust your treatment based on your responses over time. So if you want more control and data tracking, the Connected is the way to go, but if you prefer just using the device itself without an app, the Enhanced should work well for you.

templates.name: How do I know which pillow loft is best for me?
templates.content:

For combination sleepers, or sleepers who toss and turn all night, we recommend opting for a higher loft that will provide the necessary support in your side sleeping positions while still offering optimal plush comfort when you roll over.

templates.name: How do adaptogens affect stress?
templates.content:
Adaptogens are plants that help protect our bodies from the effects of stress-aka the root of most of our health issues. Be it emotional (actual stress), physical (over-exertion) or environmental (toxins/pollution) stress, adaptogens help us normalize when our systems get thrown off. Adaptogens work with your unique biology, re-balancing you based on your body's individual needs. They work specifically by supporting our adrenals-the glands that control our hormonal stress response. Adaptogens are best taken regularly to take advantage of their cumulative effect. It can take a couple of weeks to feel the benefits, so be patient and consistent!

We also recommend taking one day off from your adaptogen routine each week, and one week off every six weeks. This allows your body to re-set so you can feel the full effects of the herbs.

templates.name: What is the difference between EV and hybrid cars?
templates.content: The biggest difference between an EV (electric vehicle) and a hybrid car is that a hybrid still has a gasoline engine. If the battery runs down in a hybrid car, you can still drive it, and even recharge it, using gasoline power. On the other hand, unlike electric cars, hybrids still generate greenhouse gas emissions at their tailpipe; EVs produce zero tailpipe emissions.

templates.name: How do I fix jewelry that has become tarnished?
templates.content:
Our silver collections are made with 92.5% Sterling Silver and 7% alloy, including copper and zinc. Please note that tarnishing is not a manufacturing defect and can result due chemical reactions with moisture in your skin and alloys within the metal.

If your jewelry is tarnishing due to reactions with your skin, we suggest trying rhodium plating, in which a thin coating of rhodium will be applied to the silver, creating a protective barrier between the skin and the silver. Please contact our client care team at 1-888-838-3022 with any questions or concerns you may have about this process.

templates.name: How do I care for my boots?
templates.content: Footwear should be allowed to dry naturally before they're stored and shouldn't be stored near any heat source (temperatures not exceeding 86 degrees F. and in normal humidity (below 70%) are perfect). Use a soft brush to remove dirt and clean with mild soap and warm water. When dry, apply a coat of water repellant. This will help to maintain the color and camo pattern of your Cordura boots; as for Leather Boots, use a soft brush to remove dirt; polish may be applied to cover scuffs. Use a good leather conditioner or a very light coat of oil to keep your leather from drying and cracking. For Duty Shoes and Boots, you can use black paste polish and a good leather conditioner about 3 times a year. For Suede Shoes and Boots, remove the dirt with the help of small suede brush, and apply some suede protector and clean it with a specialized cleaner. For Patent Leather Shoes and Boots, you can clean it with a soft, damp cloth using diluted detergent. Add petroleum jelly to give it a shine. In the end buff it properly to remove the excess petroleum jelly. For Hand Sewn Shoes and Boots, you can remove loose dirt with a soft brush. Use a paste polish to cover scuffs. Apply a water repellant spray and a good leather conditioner about two times a year. As for Insoles and Footbeds, always remove foot beds from footwear after use. This allows perspiration to evaporate.

templates.name: Do I need to bleach my hair before applying the Unicorn Hair Dye?
templates.content: Unicorn Hair works best with hair that is pre-bleached, and platinum to light blonde. Full Coverage colors may tint any hair that is dark blonde/light brown, however, anything darker may not see a change in color. Since the product doesn't have any harsh chemicals or peroxide, it won't lift your current color; it'll simply lay on top of your current color. The darker the start color, the more of a tint. Anything darker than light brown may also not see a difference.

templates.name: How should I store my coffee?
templates.content: All whole-bean coffee orders are roasted fresh to order and ship directly from our roasting facility. Your whole-bean coffee is packed in a resistant, zip-locking bag that is heat-sealed with nitrogen on the same day the coffee is roasted. Nitrogen is puffed into the bag before sealing to displace the oxygen that stales coffee. Unopened bags of Purity Coffee will stay fresh tasting for about 10 months when packed with nitrogen, but of course it's best to consume sooner than later. The best way to store upon opening is in a well-sealed, opaque container on your pantry shelf. Once a bag has been opened, we recommend consumption within a month. If you have a large amount of coffee, such as a 5lb bag, and need to store it for longer after opening it, we recommend using a vacuum storage container. We recommend TightVac for up to 5 lbs of coffee storage or AirScape for a smaller storage container. Even with a vacuum storage container, it's best to portion out the amount you'll go through in 1-2 weeks in a separate, well-sealed container. This will ensure you aren't exposing the entirety of the coffee to oxygen on a daily basis.

templates.name: How do I clean my leather sofa?
templates.content: Your leather Allform will require little or no care during normal usage but the use of a quality leather conditioner every 6-12 months is recommended. For spills and stains, you should blot excess liquid with a clean, absorbent cloth or sponge. If necessary, use lukewarm water to gently clean the stain and allow to air dry. For stubborn stains, we recommend using a mild solution of Ivory soap and clear, lukewarm water to treat the spot. Please avoid the use of saddle soaps, oils, abrasive cleaners, soaps, furniture polish, oils, varnish, or ammonia water.

templates.name: Is hyaluronic acid harsh?
templates.content:
While we completely understand how the word "acid" can sound off-putting as a treatment for vaginal dryness, hyaluronic acid is a naturally-occurring molecule in the human body that can retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture. In the case of vaginal dryness, it works to attract and retain moisture in the cells of the vaginal lining, which helps to create a healing environment for thinning and damaged skin.

You can learn more about the benefits of hyaluronic acid for vaginal dryness here: https://bonafide.attn.tv/amCNmIpEh2di

templates.name: My camera is set to Photo + Video, why am I only getting photos?
templates.content: When your camera is set to Photo + Video, it takes a photo, then records a video starting 2 seconds after the photo was taken. It sends the photo and writes both the photo and video to the SD card but it does not send the video unless you request it. Once you request the video, it should appear in the app after the next time the camera contacts the server to send a photo or status report. If you request several videos from the same camera, they may come in one or two at a time.

templates.name: Do your products help with breast tenderness?
templates.content:
Relizen is specifically designed to help relieve symptoms associated with menopause, including breast pain or tenderness. While Relizen is primarily used for hot flashes and night sweats, many women report improvements in overall hormonal balance, which can also reduce breast discomfort.

If you're experiencing breast pain or tenderness, Relizen might help ease those symptoms by addressing underlying hormonal fluctuations.

However, it's always a good idea to consult a healthcare provider for a more personalized recommendation.

templates.name: Where are your products made?

We actually got into a tier 1 factory that makes the more technically advanced boots for a few other leading US brands like Thorogood, right outside of Fujian China. With comfort as our primary focus, the technology we put into the soles and insoles isn't here in the US and we couldn't sacrifice comfort. The dream is to get big enough to build our own factory here either in New Hampshire or Maine.

templates.name: Where and how are your handbags made?
templates.content: Our bags are designed in the USA by Bhaskar Basu. Bhaskar was taught by his mother, Roma, who continues to guide him today. They are then made in the family-owned and operated workshop in India. Every Anuschka leather product starts with hand cutting the top grain leather and selecting the best pieces. Traditional crafters who have learned the trade from generations before them use old school techniques to create tailor made pieces. Every handbag goes through multiple stages of inspection by our quality team to ensure that the art is perfect. A family member does a final review of every bag before it is hand signed and packed.

templates.name: What is the difference between total testosterone and free testosterone?
templates.content: Total testosterone is the most commonly used measure of testosterone in clinical practice and includes free testosterone plus protein-bound testosterone. It is present within the circulation as three major fractions: free testosterone (2-3%), sex hormone binding globulin (SHBG)-bound testosterone (60-80%) and albumin-bound testosterone (20-40%). Free testosterone and albumin-bound testosterone are referred to as "bioavailable testosterone" because these fractions are thought to be readily available to the tissues.

templates.content: Underpads, also called "chux" or "bed pads," are absorbent pads used to protect furniture. templates.name: How do I use the Daily Cleansing Protocol?  (US, UK, AU, CA & FR)
templates.content:
The Daily Cleansing Protocol is meant to be used everyday, morning and night, as an important step of your skincare routine. Both products in the protocol are meant to purify and detoxify the skin, while providing facial-grade results.

In the morning, apply one pump of the Daily Oil Cleanser directly to dry skin. Massage gently for a few minutes - this will wake up the skin and increase circulation. Rinse with warm water and follow with your skincare routine.

At night, you'll double cleanse with both products in the Protocol. Apply one pump of the Daily Oil Cleanser directly to dry skin. Massage gently, concentrating on areas with makeup, SPF, and dirt build up. Wash off with warm water. Immediately follow with Lactic Acid Gel Cleanser. Mix two pumps with water and massage into the skin, avoiding the eyes. Rinse with warm water. 

For best results, we recommend following the Daily Cleansing Protocol with the VB by Augustinus Bader Cell Rejuvenating Serum and Cell Rejuvenating Priming Moisturizer:

In other cases, John leaves work very late at night, returning the next morning to find brilliant new shoe designs waiting, with no trace of authorship. As you can understand, the only explanation possible is that God is responsible for the latter two methods, whether directly or through Angel delegation. So, here at John Fluevog Shoes, we officially have two designers: John and God. Sometimes they fight over who's head designer.

templates.name: Does Total-T contain any ingredients that inhibit aromatase and/or 5Î±-reductase?
templates.content:
The proposed mechanism of action for Testofen (fenugreek seed extract) is the inhibition of 5-alpha reductase, the enzyme that converts testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), and possibly aromatase inhibition as well. This was demonstrated in a gene expression profile analysis. Researchers also speculate that zinc interferes with the metabolism of testosterone by decreasing its hepatic (liver) clearance and reducing hepatic 5-alpha reductase activity.

However, to maximize hormone balance, we suggest taking Nugenix Estro-Regulator. One of the key ingredients found in Estro-Regulator is Diindolylmethane (DIM), which is an aromatase inhibitor that can help support estrogen balance - a critical factor for anyone wanting hardcore gains. In vitro evidence demonstrates DIM's anti-estrogen activity. Through its interaction with estrogen binding sites, it can help inhibit the reaction that converts testosterone into estrogen. Overall, this activity can diminish the impact estrogen has in the body.

templates.name: Does the NIRA compare to LYMA?
templates.content:
LYMA is not a true laser-based device, as they use a near-infrared LED light source (808 nm), optimized for Low Level Light Therapy (LLLT), and a red LED light source (620 nm). In addition, the predicate devices that they based their FDA clearance on are also LED devices.

NIRA has the first and only non-fractional, true laser-based device for home use. Our laser technology works by penetrating through the epidermis (outer skin) at a wavelength of 1450 nm to gently heat up the dermis to stimulate natural collagen production for younger-looking skin.

LYMA is not FDA-cleared or clinically validated specifically for wrinkle reduction like the NIRA is. LYMA's strength is more in skin tone, redness, and inflammation, whereas NIRA focuses on collagen stimulation and visible wrinkle reduction.

templates.name: Tell me about the Midnight Luxe? (the last sentence is optional)
templates.content: The Midnight is our medium feel memory foam model and is designed with just enough sink into the surface of the mattress without causing you to feel stuck. The Midnight allows your hips and shoulders to enjoy great pressure relief in side sleeping positions while also providing durable support for your lower back. It's considered a 5-6 on the firmness scale with 10 being the firmest, and it's one of our most popular models because of the way it combines a medium memory foam feel without sacrificing support or durability. templates.name: How is the GRIND shooting machine powered?
templates.content:
The GRIND Machine is powered only by a U.S.-standard electrical outlet (not battery-powered). In case you do not have access to an outlet, you can purchase a portable power supply that is compatible with the Machine - we recommend this one on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/CyberPower-CP1500PFCLCD-Sinewave-Outlets-Mini-Tower/dp/B00429N19W/ref=sr_1_4?crid=2TG21BQ4D2AHP&keywords=cyberpower%2Bups&qid=1636563799&qsid=147-1386276-4243140&sprefix=cyberpower%2Caps%2C282&sr=8-4&sres=B000FBK3QK%2CB00429N19W%2CB0030SL08A%2CB00LEFYISA%2CB000XJLLKG%2CB07GZR981Y%2CB000RZPK1M%2CB0083TXNMM%2CB07SKX6YWS%2CB009ACPBCQ%2CB07J4RR18Y%2CB003N6WF2O%2CB00I8RVZ9W%2CB004SQSN74%2CB01615H29O%2CB00IPNPYPA&srpt=UNINTERRUPTIBLE_POWER_SUPPLY&th=1  The GRIND Team has tested it with the Machine, showing optimal performance results. On average, our tests showed that the recommended power supply lasts for about 1.5 hours, depending on the usage.

The Machine comes with a 6-foot, three-prong extension cord, but a longer cord may need to be purchased by a third party if your outlet is further away from this distance. We recommend at least a medium-duty, three-prong extension cord that is rated for outdoor usage.

templates.name: Is there preparation for the casings before use?
templates.content:
It depends on which casing you are using. The Natural Hog, Sheep, and Beef Casings must be rinsed several times in warm water, and then soaked for Â½-1 hour until soft and pliable prior to use.

Fibrous Casings must be soaked in warm water 20-30 minutes before stuffing. Collagen Middles and Collagen Rounds must be soaked for 3-5 minutes in cool salt water (ratio 1 gallon water to 1 cup un-iodized salt). However, Non-Edible Casings with smoked flavor, Edible Collagen Casings and our Hot Dog Casings require no preparation before they are used. Hope this helps!

templates.name: Is lateral training safe for those with knee issues?
templates.content: Yes, our lateral trainers are a 'closed chain' exercise that is also non-impact. Further, because they strengthen the knee's most crucial support muscles, they're perfect for most users with knee pain. In fact, many physical therapists recommend working on a one for those who are planning to undergo, or who are recovering from, knee replacement surgery. After surgery, we always recommend checking with your physician or physical therapist for guidance about when it's appropriate to begin training again.

templates.name: Is ARMRA Colostrum FDA approved?
templates.content:
The United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulates prescription and over-the-counter drugs. ARMRA, however, is a whole food, an all-natural product that is 100% drug-free.

Even so, we hold ourselves to the highest standards of testing, safety and quality. All ARMRA Colostrum is manufactured in FDA-certified facilities to adhere to the strict requirements of the FDA, under the strict criteria of Current Good Manufacturing Practices (CGMPs).

templates.name: Is my bottle dishwasher safe? Microwave safe?
templates.content:
Stainless steel bottles without any coating are dishwasher safe, if the bottle has any color or graphic applied, it's not dishwasher safe unless otherwise marked on the packaging. All stainless-steel bottles are not microwave-safe.

Plastic Tritan bottles are dishwasher safe. If you're unsure if your bottle is Tritan check the bottom of the bottle or let me know and I'll be happy to help out. Plastic bottles are generally not microwave safe. The lids are top rack dishwasher safe.

templates.name: How do I clean the Litter-Robot exterior?

templates.name: How do I take care of opals, pearls, or coral?
templates.content: Pearls and Opals thrive when worn because they absorb the natural oils and moisture from your skin! However, a rule of thumb is "Last On, First Off" when dressing to avoid chemicals or string damage. Store pearls and opals in a non-airtight soft fabric pouch to avoid drying out and exterior damage. Clean by gently rubbing each bead using a slightly damp, soft cloth to remove debris such as perfume, makeup, or perspiration. Be sure to completely dry the strand before storing to avoid thread deterioration. When cared and stored properly, pearls and opals will retain their beauty and luster providing you with heirloom quality organic beads.

templates.name: What tests have you done to ensure your towel is effective in eliminating bacteria?
templates.content:
We hired an independent agency that is located in Maryland whose mission is to reduce the transmission of infections in the communities they serve. The doctors in this agency have over 20 years of academic research experience and have worked on numerous research initiatives including the use of antimicrobial surfaces in healthcare environments. We tested multiple towels with and without silver woven technology and noticed that all towels without our unique silver technology reduced bacteria by 0%. All towels with our unique silver technology reduced bacteria by 99.998%.

We also ran multiple independent tests where our towels were subjected to repeated wash cycles. Our towels were removed at 25, 50, 75 and 100 wash intervals to see if the antibacterial system was washed away in any of these instances. The results revealed that the towels remained 99.9% effective even after 100 washes. So your towel will always be as effective for the lifetime of the product.

templates.name: How does Tongkat Ali work?
templates.content: Tongkat Ali increases your male hormone levels by stimulating the Leydig cells in your testes and making them produce more androgens. The main active compound in Tongkat Ali is eurycomanone. Additionally, Tongkat Ali is known to somewhat inhibit the aromatase enzyme, which transforms androgens into female hormones.

templates.name: My razor has rust. What do I do?
templates.content: Use a gentle castile soap, and an old soft toothbrush, and gently scrub any rust. You can disassemble it and soak it in warm water for a few minutes before scrubbing if there's a lot of buildup. Dry with a towel and store when done. If your razor seems to be prone to rust (say you live in a very humid environment) apply a little oil after cleaning, as it prevents corrosion by repelling water.

templates.name: What is the benefit of a wider bra strap?
templates.content: Full-figure women may find more comfort and support in bras with wider straps. Comfortable straps are of focus at Curvy Couture, where all bras are designed to have a slightly wider, cushioned strap for your everyday comfort. Thin straps can distress the shoulders due to the amount of pressure exerted on a thinner piece of fabric. Wider straps alleviate some of the pressure and can help properly support large breasts without causing stress in the shoulder and arms.

templates.name: Are your delivery/shipping timeframes guaranteed?
templates.content: Shipments are guaranteed for Ground, 3 Day, 2 Day, Overnight and Saturday. If our delivery partner misses the delivery then we'll refund the shipping on your gift. Please know that if the recipient is not home and was unable to deliver the package, this does not qualify as missing the delivery. Also, circumstances beyond our control, such as severe weather, natural disasters and so forth void the delivery guarantee. We run over 99% on time so trouble with shipping is a very infrequent event.

templates.name: Do you need to water the flowers?

templates.name: Do you offer a free birthday gift?
templates.content: Yes! First thing's first, be sure to update your profile with your birthday month and make sure you're subscribed to our emails. On your birthday, check your email! templates.name: Are your products CertiPUR certified?
templates.content:
All of our foams are eco-friendly and nontoxic as certified by CertiPUR-USÂ®. It means the foam in the bedding has been tested to meet CertiPUR-USÂ® rigorous standards for emissions, content, performance, and durability. Specifically, the foam is:

- Made without ozone depleters
- Made without PBDEs or the following Tris flame retardants: TCEP, TDBPP, TDCPP or TEPA
- Made without mercury, lead and heavy metals
- Made without formaldehyde
- Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
- Low VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 parts per million)

templates.name: How does the Luminox Light Technology work?
templates.content:
The fluorescent tubes from Luminox, which we call LLT are constructed in such a way that they light up for up to 25 years - with a 10-year lighting guarantee from the date of purchase, provided the watch is not exposed to strong vibrations. 

Luminox watches glow continuously for up to 25 years, even in complete darkness. Every watch is equipped with small micro gas tubes that don't require an external energy source. These micro gas lights are attached to the hands, hour digits or on the dial and in some cases in the bezel of our watches. These fluorescent tubes are harmless to humans and the environment.

templates.name: How do I clean Made In Bakeware?
templates.content:
While our bakeware is dishwasher safe, it's always best to wash by hand to keep every piece pristine. Simply use the soft side of a sponge with warm, soapy water, and you should always allow your bakeware to cool before beginning to clean or care for the piece!

For a deeper clean, sprinkle a layer of baking soda on the surface of the dish, and then add some dish soap and fill your baking dish with hot water. Let the dish soak for 15-20 minutes. Scrape the food in the baking dish to free up any residue or use a sponge to scrub the stains, pour out the water, and rinse the baking dish.

templates.name: Do your meats have any vaccines?

We believe our suppliers must be committed to raising healthy animals for a wholesome meat supply, and this may include the use of antibiotics administered as a feed additive. According to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), the use of antibiotics in animals presents virtually no risk to consumers.

Regarding mRNA vaccines that prevent COVID-19, the USDA's current list of licensed veterinary biologics does not include any vaccines of this type for use in animals. Omaha Steaks products do not contain this vaccine in them.

templates.name: Can I use a hair dryer instead when installing my skin?
templates.content: This's a frequently asked question and the answer is yes! It doesn't take much heat for the vinyl to become malleable. As a matter of fact, we recommend using a low setting if possible. It's better to hit the vinyl with a left and right sweeping motion, warming the vinyl just enough to handle without being too hot to touch.  It's also a good idea to heat the surface of the gun prior to installation. Having both the surface and the vinyl warm will accelerate adhesion and ensure maximum bondage.

templates.name: Air conditioner powers on but won't run
templates.content: If your air conditioner powers on but will not run, this is usually the result of an inadequate power supply for the unit. Turn the circuit breaker to the unit off and back on again. If the breaker is tripping and causing the loss of power, turn off all other electrical devices in the room besides the air conditioner. If the air conditioner runs fine with the other devices turned off, then likely the unit isn't on a dedicated circuit breaker. If your air conditioner isn't on a dedicated circuit breaker, the unit may power on but not run. The reason for this is the unit doesn't require as much power to display the settings, or even run the fan, as it does to turn on and run the compressor. The air conditioner must be on a dedicated circuit breaker not shared with other outlets. Please check the specifications sheet for your particular unit to determine the power requirements.

templates.name: Personalization: Terms & Conditions
templates.content:
Please note you will be asked to review the following personalization Terms & Conditions before you place your order: 
1.  Final Sale: Personalized items cannot be canceled, returned, or exchanged once an order is placed. 
2.  Digital Preview vs. Final Product: Slight variations may occur due to screen differences, thread texture, and fabric details. 
3.  Text Restrictions: Offensive or inappropriate text is prohibited. Orders violating this policy may be canceled. 
4.  Warranty: Warranties apply only to the product itself. 
5.  Past Purchases: Customers will not be able to send back previously purchased CALPAK items to be personalized.  
6.  Production Time: Add up to 5 extra business days to standard processing for personalized items.

templates.name: Can my dog wear the shoe over a bandage?
templates.content: Our dog shoes are a great temporary solution for walking dogs when they have a bandage on. However, if your dog is injured, we don't recommend wearing the shoe over the bandaged paw for long periods of time, as your dog's paw needs time to rest and heal. Please consult with your veterinarian before using shoes, as each dog's medical condition can vary on a case by case basis.

templates.name: Are your shoes steel-toed?
templates.content: No, steel toes are getting more outdated by the day. The only reason you still see them around is they're the cheapest safety toe to make. We use a newer technology called Nano Composite Safety toe, it meets the same ASTM safety standards as steel, but is half the weight, doesn't conduct electricity, and doesn't get cold in the winter or hot in the summer.
